_header: In that time and in that land / Eleven disciples were sitting

Bod425.First Lines:
In þat time and in þat
                    landeEllefe disciples wore
                    sitand…
Bod425.Last Lines:
…God wirkand and sagh festenandWith tokenes þat wore
                    filihand
Bod425.Editions:
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             “Eine vergessene handscrift des Surteespsalters und die dort
                eingeschalteten mittelenglischen gedichte.” 
             Anglia
         29 (1906): 385-412: 404-5.
